title: Allen West Rips Obama on Iran - CNN iReport
text:
Allen West Rips Obama on Iran By JDBSD | Posted 21 hours ago 
CNN PRODUCER NOTE Don't know that I agree with everything Allen West says or stands for - but he got it right on Iran. I suppose he is just a racist who hates Obama because he is black, right? http://therightscoop.com/allen-west-explodes-over-iran-deal-obliterates-obama-in-fiery-times-square-speech/ TAGS: What do you think of this story? Select one of the options below. Your feedback will help tell CNN producers what to do with this iReport. If you'd like, you can explain your choice in the comments below. Be and editor! Choose an option below:
